locations.title: Love's Travel Stop
locations.content: Love's Travel Stop may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText:
Been at this loves a few times ✅

So great water pressure ✅

Really hot water✅

No extra towels✅

Roof looks kinda weird ✅

Shower was pretty clean ✅

Shower has cup holders on wall ✅

Overall not a bad shower ✅

People were GREAT! Welcoming. I’m glad the actual shower was cleaned but the rest.... hair on toilet and floors. Even fingernail clippings. You have to clean the toilets!!! I should have done a video. The walls were filthy and hair in …

… Clean woman’s restrooms. I didn’t get a chance to shower bc I wanted to wash my clothing first after cleaning out my truck and I couldn’t. I don’t like that they don’t have a laundry room, that was my sole purpose of stopping here. Lugged …
Excellent! I put on fuel, I'm going to take my ten hour break then shower in the morning.

I love stopping here for fuel and a shower. Parking fills up fairly early. Clean and organized store and friendly staff. Does not get as jammed up as other Loves on I-90/94. This Loves has clean AND sanitized shower rooms.  The last several …
Staff are super nice and welcoming but the showers are gross.. …

Typically no issues with this Loves but went in to shower and the shower was just filthy. The shower stall and sink areas seemed clean but there was trash and dust all over the floors where they haven't been bothering  to sweep or mop. Even …

Everything thing was clean. Shower was clean an hot water. Had a tire changed Kory helped us an was friendly an efficient.  Joseph in the tire shop was rude to other tireshop employees horrible attitude

I had to do a 34 hour rest here.I used the shower the toilet looked like had not been cleaned in weeks.The bathroom was in the same shape.The toilet was not cleaned either.This falls back on management for not checking out what workers …

We bought a shower and the attendant asked where our truck was parked, we said it’s on the parking lot, behind the building, then she gave us the code to shower #4. In 15 minutes, when I was showering, she started yelling outside the shower …

locations.title: Petro Travel Center
locations.content: Petro Travel Center may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: This place has plenty of showers but they are so gross! My shower had hair in the sink, lots of dark colored gunk on tiles, tp in the toilet and it was obvious nothing is cleaned between showers just restocked with towels. Showers have bad …
… Same old Petro travel store you see anywhere, and showers that are outdated, but live able. …

I enjoyed the shower. The Hot water remained hot for which I am grateful for given other truck stops. I was disappointed by the conditions of the shower. Cracked ceiling, and tiles. I imagine some sort of renovation is need asap.

They didn't have food at 9 a.m. and this is what the platinum shower looks like. Kind of curious what regular shower it looks like. I thought petro and ta had H"ospital level" cleanliness. If covid-19 was a shower room that's what it would …

Big parking lot, fuel desk guy was nice. Shower are outdated , vents doesn't work so it feels like you are having a steam room, everything is wet, walls and floor. Also those little stairs hallway going to Petro tells you a lot how this …

Paid $17 for a shower, got in bathroom and it was just disgusting, wasn’t clean at all and from the looks of it hasn’t been for a while, and there was no running water! The person that was cleaning bathrooms obviously wasn’t cleaning them, …

I usually like parking here, but I don't think I'll be taking a shower here anymore.
The counter/sink was not cleaned, and they clearly didn't clean the shower since the used soap bar is still in there.

Would give the showers 0 stars if that was a possibility. Not the worst shower but in the top 5 considering I've been on the road since 91 that's an accomplishment.  They were semi clean but this place definitely needs an upgrade tiles …
*I am a car driver and needed a place to shower, eat and rest over night, this place delivered!* …
Seventeen bucks for a shower and you have to wait until the they them upstairs is in the mood to clean one, ask it how long and it gets very entitled and bitchy

locations.title: TA Travel Center
locations.content: TA Travel Center may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: Pretty decent TA, very friendly staff, showers were clean and in good order. Their washing machines are a bit expensive. They have a nice TV room and a good shop. Decent amount of truck parking outed. I'd suggest getting here early by 2:00. It was 3/4 of the way full
David McleanLocal Guide · 836 reviews · 963 photos

Bad place, so we stopped on aug 24th. They had no showers for that day because they only had 1 person at counter and nobody available to clean showers. Besides the Manager. So I go to get a shower next morning and cannot because my shower …

Dirty bathroom and empty toilet paper.  Got 1 slice of pizza for $3.99 and it was worst pizza I've ever had. Crust tasted like cardboard and pulling off the cheese and pepperoni still didn't improve it at all. Done with TA  and Petro. They …

The worst TA I've ever seen, dirty bathrooms, trash everywhere, careless employees hanging at the cashier flirting with each other and vaping, I spent $1000 on diesel. at least I deserve clean truck stop, shame on you TA

… No glass door in shower …

It’s ok. You can always find parking so far, the showers could be better, there is really no place to put your things and I don’t care to use a shower curtain that everyone else has used, so water gets all over the floor. The ventilation is …
Showers are awful. No shelfs to put your stuff. I really hate the shower curtains, no one want that to touch your body. Gross.

showerReviews.reviewText: Very nice little truck stop, clean showers and hot. No toilet in the shower area which is a innocence, however the clean ,refreshing shower makes up for it. Nice staff,friendly, polite people. All in all you can eat subway or other food and …

After a hot day of unloading FD the shower was heaven, great water pressure. I gave them four starts because there is no toilet in the shower room, it was cold when I went into the room, and though it was clean could use an update.  Don't …
Nice people good food selection.. shower's subway... good sized parking lot... What else do you need.

locations.title: Iowa 80 - The World's Largest Truckstop
locations.content: Iowa 80 - The World's Largest Truckstop may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: … We spent the night in the RV lot after seeking shelter from dangerous winds & possible severe t-storms. We were able to do laundry & shower,  All very clean.  The laundry was very clean & reasonably priced... would definitely recommend! A …

… has many hidden amenities.  A great place for everyone but especially for truckers, and long haulers, as they have laundry and shower facilities as well as a dentist, barber, work out facilities and so much more! We love stopping on our …

… entertainment. There’s a huge convenience store for your snack needs and a diner that serves both menu items and a buffet. Didn’t get a shower there but the restrooms were clean. The place has 3 floors that includes a barber. There’s also …

Pretty big with lots to do. Has a shower area. Tons of restaurants. Stuff for kids to explore and see. Has a chiropractor on site. This place has leveled up in the last few years by adding tons of stuff. …

Hadn't been here in years. Went to take a shower on Palm Sunday and Pastor Daryl was giving a sermon in the lounge in front of the showers. The Lord told me to stay. Was warm & friendly service. Then I met with the pastor for 4 hours that …

… of necessities and snacks. Spend some time wandering around the main store area, there's plenty to see. Clean restrooms and shower. Navigate through the various gift shops located throughout the facility. You can also get customized …

World’s biggest truck stop. Besides truck parking which can park 900 trucks you have a restaurant, theatre, shower rooms, lounge, convince stores. Its is spread in 75 acres. If I am not wrong you can park here for free. It has fuel station …

This place is huge. There’s a food court inside the truck stop. Upstairs there are dentist, chiropractor, shower, laundry, hair salon. And the truck section of stuff takes up half of the place. Parking was no problem. There’s also tesla …
… You can take a shower, get a haircut, and watch a movie. There's even a dentist and a chiropractor. …

… and friendly service here you can buy too much trick stuff from here lights bumper fittings hoses etc. little price higher Coustmer service very good here i love this location shower also very clean and too much like more than 25 may be

showerReviews.reviewText: Went here for my shower was Happy they are in the Pilot Network but was like  well Dang, you only get a dry off towel.. NO WASHCLOTH, NOR FOOT TOWELS.  MAKE SURE TO BRING YOUR OWN ..   Also while in the shower room getting out the shower …
Forever wait for a shower cause they’re to lazy to clean one …
The showerrooms up stairs are way to unbearably hot to shower in. On the other hand, the restaurant is good.
showerReviews.uniqueId: Kaleb Lippert (Saints and Angels Channel)_The_showerrooms_up_stairs_are_way_to_unbearably_ho_2 months ago

showerReviews.reviewText: … The place has anything and everything you can ever think or wish for. Open 24/7 its the one stop shop. Truckers heaven. Bathrooms, shower, restaurant, assorted truck stickers and such. Get everything you want!!!! Ill be back!!!!!! Enjoy!!!!

First time here but this a very nice truck. People are really friendly.  Great shower nice and hot. The only fault was restaurant needs to open a little bit longer. This place beats the pilot and love truck stops. Keep up the great work. I …

… the service was alright. The store though? Nope. The cashiers were rude. I had purchased fuel & went back in after parking & waiting for the customer base to slow to get a shower. There are 2 of us, but we share shower rooms since it is my …

… restaurant is great. Parking is okay kind of disorganized. What really bumped them down on the stars is the early morning employees don't clean the showers and wouldn't sell me a shower when requested. He said I had to wait until 7:00 when …

This place was clean, the linens were gorgeous and super comfy. The Roman shower was perfect for my needs. I was staying there because I was having a consult at the University of MN. I took 1 star off because I was surprised by the $27 …

Do not take a shower here. You can't breathe because of all the chemicals. It was miserable. So many of us are chemically sensitive or allergic to things. There was no air conditioning or air circulation in th ed shower stall. We did get a …
I really love this truckstop it’s really clean a lot of parking a lot of food good shower good  good customer service everything is so perfect 🤩 …

showerReviews.reviewText: … not light up on the fleet card side. However, the professional driver area is nice! It has laundry, arcade with slots, a driver lounge and 3 showers ($11)! They give you a dollars worth of quarts you have to put in to start the shower …

Went in for shower. Was told co worker cleaning showers. 30 mins later I walk back to showers. No one cleaning. I went back up front and when I asked about when will there be a clean shower I was told it didn’t matter cause they have no …

… and walls) being sprayed 4 times before I was done due to the toilet spraying out. I would say restroom use should come with a free shower and laundry to clean up after, but other reviews sound like it wouldn't be much of an improvement. …

Nice place, plenty parking for trucks. Odd thing was the shower, they give you 4 quarters and you get 25mins of water. The water is instantly hot and has good pressure though, the shower room is spacious as well. Nothin bad it just took me …

Very nice truck stop. Decent parking. Though kinda of odd that they make you use quarters to use the shower due to being on well water. But the water quality is excellent and showers are very nice. Just put all quarters in first to use.

Mrs. Deana was a doll. Extremely nice facilities! Shower was the best.  Last for about 15 min then you have to deposit quarters.  Not to unusual. Been to a few TS's like that.  Will DEFINITELY  go back next time im in the area! Nice laundry …

Always clean. But having to put quarters in a machine in the shower rooms to have hot water is rediculous. Even though they give you 4 quarters when you pay for your shower the idea of controlling the hot water is uncalled for.

I paid 11$ for a shower. They gave me 4 quarters that you put in the slot and yuo have 25min limited shower. Cabin 1 didn't have water pressure at all and the water was ice cold. Bad experience with these folks, the only reason why I didn't …
